snippet: The legislation criminalized leaks of Vatican information and specifically listing sexual violence, prostitution and possession of child pornography as crimes against children.
abstract: Pope Francis overhauls laws that govern Vatican City State, criminalizing leaks of Vatican information and specifically listing sexual violence, prostitution and possession of child pornography as crimes against children.
lead_paragraph: The legislation criminalized leaks of Vatican information and specifically listing sexual violence, prostitution and possession of child pornography as crimes against children.
